Author: synedchdochee
Text: I lost a lot of weight really fast, started eating vegetarian and running a lot and I've played it off as a "now that I'm at college I want to take control of my health haha (OBVI not starving myself?? and overexercising??? And restricting??? whaaat?) And it breaks my heart because my mom always looks wistfully at my legs and talks about how skinny they are and how she misses when we used to share clothes and she just constantly talked about how good I look skinny and how she misses when she was my weight at her age.   The last few times I visted her the fridge was completely empty except maybe a bag of spring mix and some saltines in the pantry and I'm so worried. When I asked she just says she's trying to save money or hates going grocery shopping and those are the same excuses I gave her when I was losing weight too fast and she was worried :(

Author: flortotheno
Text: I feel you. I feel like im powering an ED in my mom who's tryna make herself and my brother diet to hell :(
